content.html: @schnarfed Love how the @indiewebcamp keeps on iterating and building upon documented experiences year after year without giving me a stressed out feeling of FOMO for not spending every awake second there. Great stewardship by you, @t, @aaronpk, @kevinmarks and all the rest :)
content.value:
@schnarfed Love how the @indiewebcamp keeps on iterating and building upon documented experiences year after year without giving me a stressed out feeling of FOMO for not spending every awake second there.

Great stewardship by you, @t, @aaronpk, @kevinmarks and all the rest :)
